title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.84 - Distribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.84 - Distribution

State Regulations
(a) Any payment to
stockholders or owners of cash, property or shares, including any of the
various forms of dividend; in noncorporate enterprise, a withdrawal. (b) A spread of revenue or expenditure or of
capital additions to various accounts; an allocation. (c) Disposal of a product by sale. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.84

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
